result.eng: It will be cold tomorrow morning.
result.ga: beidh sé fuar maidin amárach
result.orig: beidh sé fuar maidin amárach

result.ponchtml: beiḋ sé fuar maidin amáraċIt will be cold tomorrow morning.

result.eng: What's wrong with you? - A cold, I think.
result.ga: cad atá ort - slaghdán sílim
result.orig: cad atá ort - slaghdán sílim
result.html: cad atá ort - slaghdán sílimWhat's wrong with you? - A cold, I think.

result.eng: They protected me from the cold.
result.ga: chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.orig: chosain siad roimh an fhuacht mé
result.html: chosain siad roimh an fhuacht méThey protected me from the cold.
result.ponchtml: ċosain siad roiṁ an ḟuaċt méThey protected me from the cold.

result.eng: They got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.ponchtml: fuair siad faoiseaṁ ón ḃfuaċt nuair a ċuir siad a láṁa timpeall na gcupán teThey got relief from the cold when they put their hands around the warm cups.

result.eng: One week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ga: bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.orig: bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuar
result.html: bhí seachtain amháin deas te ach bhí an dara seachtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.
result.ponchtml: ḃí seaċtain aṁáin deas te aċ ḃí an dara seaċtain beagáinín fuarOne week was nice and warm, but the second week was a little cold.

result.html: bhí sé fuarIt was cold.

result.html: bhí sé an-fhuarIt was very cold.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.orig: d'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar

result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.ponchtml: ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.eng: His teeth were chattering from cold.
